description: This file defines the application configuration for an Angular project, including providers for zone change detection, routing, and client hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular's zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up the Angular router with provided routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay for server-side rendered Angular apps.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay behavior for hydration.
